thread.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi revealed as name of Episode VIII as the saga continues
thread.title_full: Star Wars: The Last Jedi revealed as name of Episode VIII as the saga continues

author: Jo-Anne Rowney
title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi revealed as name of Episode VIII as the saga continues
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
Disney has finally announced the title of the next Star Wars film in the Skywalker saga - and it's sure to get everyone talking. 
Rian Johnson's movie carried on the story from Force Awakens and was announced on starwars.com. 
Fans are already speculating, with many pointing out the title could be a reference to Luke Sykwalker, who Rey found on Ach-To at the end of the last film. 
It's important to remember Jedi is plural and singular, so the title doesn't give away anything about Rey and Luke's fates. Read More Star Wars' latest villain Adam Driver says next film Episode VIII will be "remarkable" 
Lucasfilm released a statement saying: "We have the greatest fans in this or any other galaxy. 
"In appreciation of the fans, we wanted them to be the first to know the title of the next chapter in the Skywalker saga: STAR WARS: THE LAST JEDI. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
